explains: abbr. 液晶显示屏（liquid crystal display）
wordGroup: lcd display n. 液晶显示器；液晶屏幕
lcd screen abbr. 液晶屏幕（liquid crystal display screen）
lcd panel 液晶显示屏幕

sentences.en: However good your monitor is, whether it is low-radiant or LCD, you will definitely feel light-headed after a day of web-surfing.
sentences.cn: 不管你的显示器有多好，不管是低辐射的还是 LCD 的，在浏览了一天的网页后，你肯定会感到头晕。

sentences.en: My laptop's LCD screen was broken.
sentences.cn: 我笔记本电脑的液晶显示屏坏了。

sentences.en: As a result, the price of LCD screens has tumbled.
sentences.cn: 结果，液晶显示器的价格下降了。
